title: Is She Wrong For Telling Her Ex-Husband's Girlfriend He's Cheating On Her?
description:
She and her ex-husband continued hooking up after their divorce. The agreement was good until he started dating someone else. She couldn't handle the situation, so she told his girlfriend EVERYTHING! Is she wrong?
